content.rendered:
Directed by Srinath Rajendran

Written by K.S. Aravind. K.S. Aravind. R.P. Bala. Jithin K. Jose. Daniell Sayooj Nair. Daniell Sayooj Nair. Mohan Nair

Cast Dulquer Salmaan(Gopikrishna Pillai / Sudakara Kurup). Indrajith Sukumaran(DYSP Krishnadas). Sobhita Dhulipala(Sharadamma). Shine Tom Chacko(Pilla). Sunny Wayne(Peter). Tovino Thomas(Charlie). Bharath Srinivasan(Izaakh). Anand Bal(Police Constable).M.R. Gopakumar.Surabhi Lakshmi.Vini Vishwa Lal. Akhill Menon(Police Constable). Maya Menon(Gomathi).Suresh Oberoi. Anupama Parameswaran(Charlie’s wife). Walid Riachy(Rashid ( The Prince )). Angel Shijoy(Sharadamma (voice)). Shivajith(Shahu (as Shivajith Padmanabhan))

Language Malayalam

Producers Sachin Agarwal. Prassanth Kumar Chandran.

Production M Star Satellite Communications. Wayfarer Films
